flawed_nl_solution:
Arthur is 2 years older than Susan, so he is 15 + 2 = <<15+2=17>>17 years old.
Bob is 11 years old, so Tom is 11 - 3 = <<11-3=9>>9 years old.
So in total these four family members have 11 + 15 + 17 + 9 = <<11+15+17+9=52>>52 years.
#### 52

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 8, not 9. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
